item.source: Making a global object teleport one way, then back again. (REWARD)

item.title: Making a global object teleport one way, then back again. (REWARD)
item.dc:creator: @inuyasha_12345 inuyasha 12345
item.description:
@inuyasha_12345 wrote:

I know of one way, but you need to add both the objects in 2 places and put like this (im going to use 2644 asd my portal)

case 2466: //teleporting portals if (objectX == 3095 && objectY == 3502) {//pk portal teleportToX = 3088; teleportToY = 3522; sendMessage("teleport1!"); } if (objectX == 3096 && objectY == 3502) {//wc portal teleportToX = 3052; teleportToY = 3511; sendMessage("teleport2."); }
the case’s are the object ID
OBJ x and y are the coords, put the coord of the object there
the teleportx and tekeport y are the coords they tele to
the sendmessage is a message sent when a player uses the object

Hope this helps!

Read full topic

		if ((objectID == 5104) && (objectX == 2683) && (objectY == 9569)) {
			// Lava Cave Vines2 -bakatool
			teleportToX = 2683;
			teleportToY = 9570;
		}

If you can make it teleport back the other way, I will give you admin.
